column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////For our deep dish
column2: we went the classic and it was better than we expected - thinking we were going to be presented a doughy pizza
column4: less bread and more of everything else. Each slice you cut is oozing of cheese and sauces
column5: leaving us eager to take a bite
column6: and it didnt stop with one bite
column7: or one slice. This is the best pizza I have ever had.
